pr_title: Add SET_AGG as an efficient replacement for ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT)

timeline.message: Implement SET_AGG as an efficient replacement for ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT).

timeline.bodyText: You probably want to introduce some set_agg test rather than this?
timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: Yeah - this started out as a better implementation for array_agg(distinct) but morphed into this new agg. Will fix it.
replies.author: kaikalur

timeline.message: Implement SET_AGG as an efficient replacement for ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT).

timeline.bodyText: Can we also add tests for other types and maybe query based on tpch?
timeline.author: rongrong

timeline.bodyText: Only add this value if we haven't seen it before?
timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: I don't think this comment is necessary actually, the code is pretty clear.
replies.author: rongrong

timeline.bodyText: I know you copied the logic from KeyValuePairs. I'm wondering can we simplify this logic? Since this function can only be called when valuePositionByHash[hashPosition] == EMPTY_SLOT (this is guarded by logic in ValueExists) this should be a checkState rather than an if. Or if we want to use if, we can put the appendTo inside the if statement and remove valueExists.
timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: Yeah - I'm going to just inline the whole thing.
replies.author: kaikalur
